category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_group_query_filter
preference.preference_description: Defines a set of conditions that an LDAP object must satisfy to be matched as a group object for synchronizing with Teamcenter. If you are familiar with LDAP query filter syntax, use this optional preference, which is a more sophisticated object matching mechanism. Valid value: Accepts a single string in LDAP query filter syntax.
